title: Triangle UFO Over Glasgow
description: Bright triangular object moving silently across the night sky. Three distinct lights at each corner.

title: Circular Craft in Edinburgh
description: Large circular object with rotating lights observed for several minutes before disappearing.

title: Disk-Shaped Object Near Loch Ness
description: Metallic disk-shaped craft hovering above the loch surface. Made no sound whatsoever.

title: Strange Lights in Aberdeen
description: Multiple bright lights in formation moving erratically across the sky.

title: Cylindrical UFO in Stirling
description: Long cylindrical object moving at high speed. No wings or propulsion visible.
